string-array.name: advices
string-array.item: Scroll down in this list to get more useful tips!
Select the ring below to change color
Press \'start service\' to start overlapping display, tap 2x to expand to whole screen
Press \'start in app\' to fill entire screen
If the app isn\'t working correctly, please let me know on Facebook below
The phone is NOT locked when the app is in use unless you turn it on manually below!
You can have a little ring on your screen when reading so screen will never turn off.
This app can drain your battery when using LCD display. Please make sure, that you have OLED.
You can also use tints in notifications area. Just add it from button list.
To prevent burning OLED displays, do not let any color (except black) on the screen for longer periods of time
